snippet: California Indian tribes have received federal approval of gambling agreements with Gov. Gray Davis, clearing the final hurdle to legalizing their casinos.    The gambling compacts with about 60 tribes were approved on Friday by Kevin Gover, the I...
lead_paragraph: California Indian tribes have received federal approval of gambling agreements with Gov. Gray Davis, clearing the final hurdle to legalizing their casinos. The gambling compacts with about 60 tribes were approved on Friday by Kevin Gover, the Interior Department's assistant secretary of Indian affairs. The agreement ended a long fight by the tribes to run casinos.
abstract: California Indian tribes receive federal approval of gambling agreements with Gov Gray Davis, clearing final hurdle to legalizing their casinos (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; California Indians Win Final Casino Approval
